span.style: font-family: Comic Sans MS; font-weight: normal; color: #550000; font-style: normal
font-family: 微软雅黑; font-weight: normal; color: #000000; font-style: normal

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 倾向： to give a tendency to: incline
【例】 faulty diet disposes one to sickness 营养不全面导致疾病
【考法 2】 vi. 处理掉： to get rid of; throw out
【例】Dispose of these old newspapers
【派】 disposal n. 处理，不再利用： the act of getting rid of something that is no longer wanted or needed
【例】 the permanent disposal of radioactive wastes 对放射性废物的永久处理
【考法 3】 v. 布置： to place, distribute, or arrange especially in an orderly way
【例】 Dispose the surgical手术的 instruments in the exact order
【近】 array, arrange
【反】 disarrange, disarray, disorder, upset, mess up, muss up 使混乱
